select count(qa.seq) from tb_employment qa ,tb_userinfo ui WHERE qa.loginID = ui.loginID
AND qa.hire_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startdate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND qa.resign_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{enddate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND qa.cop_name like concat('%',#{searchword},'%')
select seq ,name ,loginID ,hire_date ,resign_date ,cop_name ,work_yn FROM tb_employment WHERE seq =#{seq}
